posts.post_content:
I have some T206 Lajoies in my collection that I wouldn't mind upgrading. Images are posted below. If you have one that's aesthetically better and want to downgrade and pick up some cash, let me know to see whether we can work a trade. All of the cards below are graded; I can let anyone who's interested know the number on the flip. I'm interested in only trading the same cards; I'll have to pass on a PSA 5 Piedmont 350 portrait for the lower-grade Uzit batting pose.

Also, please note that on the Sweet Caporals, factory numbers matter.

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com [/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/bat-ab460.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/bat-uzit.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/throw-sc-150-fact-25.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/port-hindu.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/port-oldmill_1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/port-pied-350.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/port-sov-350.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206/port-sc350-fact-25.jpg[/IMG]
I've got an sgc 10 piedmont 150 for your Uzit...  I don't care about the grade.

I might be interested in doing a trade deal for one of your portraits.

This card now resides in an SGC 45 holder.

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/lajoiethrowing_zpsf7a3e919.jpg[/IMG]

My apologies for a confusing post.

My hope is to trade a card I posted for a nicer version of the same card, with me including cash to make the trade even.

In other words, my Hindu Napoleon Lajoie portrait plus cash for a better-looking Hindu Napoleon Lajoie portrait.

My AB 460 Napoleon Lajoie batting pose plus cash for a batter-looking AB 460 Napoleon Lajoie batting pose.

My Sweet Caporal 150 Factory 25 Napoleon Lajoie throwing pose plus cash for a nicer-looking Sweet Caporal 150 Factory 25 Napoleon Lajoie throwing pose.

Etc.

Again, sorry for the confusion.

Rob

I was attempting to be funny - I need to work on my delivery:eek:.

Good luck with your pursuit, you've got some awesome cards!

No worries, Tony. I knew you were joking.

I received a few emails that made it obvious to me that my original post wasn't clear.

Thanks.
I dont think he was referring to your post Tony

Hi Rob,

Unfortunately I can't help you upgrade your Lajoies, but I do know where you can purchase a T206 Cobb Red Portrait w/ Lenox back.

If interested, PM me and I'll send over the details.  It just went up for sale so you're gonna have to act quickly!

Mike
